hero_title: As Vast as the Ocean,Carrying Waves of Trust and Innovation to the Next Generation
hero_subtitle: We aim to be a next-generation global company from Japan in the world market.
feature_desc: Blue Ocean Co., Ltd. maximizes the potential of all real estate by combining data analysis with a global perspective. From revitalizing idle properties to supporting accommodation facility operations, we provide new-era real estate solutions that contribute to enhancing our clients' asset value.
vision_main: As Vast as the Ocean,Carrying Waves of Trust and Innovation to the Next Generation
vision_sub: We merge deep expertise in international trade, IT, and real estate to become a competitive, next-generation global company originating from Japan.
services_1_desc: As a reliable bridge connecting Japan and the world, we build and support efficient and stable global supply chains.
services_2_desc: We develop cutting-edge SaaS applications in-house to resolve business inefficiencies and strongly promote corporate DX.
services_3_desc: Utilizing data and IT, we provide comprehensive support from the revitalization to the operation of idle properties, maximizing asset value.
about_subtitle: Blue Ocean Co., Ltd. is a next-generation global company that creates new value in diverse business areas, centered on trust and innovation.
